title: Counters:
text:
Used to represent a Combat Manoeuvre , Innate Ability, or Active Ability that affects models on the battlefield. Unlike Markers and Icons, Counters can be 'stacked' and are accumulated during the game. They are positioned on the battlefield anywhere near the model that they are affecting, but do not have a physical presence in-game.

Examples of Counters: Skoll's Bulwark, Lugdrug's Energy, Cradol's Shadow Mist
